mapper.select: select sa.id ,sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_name,sa.sale_attr_id, sv.id sale_attr_value_id, sv.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr sa inner join spu_sale_attr_value sv on sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id and sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id where sa.spu_id=#{spu_id}

SELECT sa.id, sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_id, sa.sale_attr_name, sv.id sale_attr_value_id, sv.sale_attr_value_name, skv.sku_id, IF (sku_id IS NULL, 0, 1) is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id = sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = sv.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skv ON skv.sale_attr_value_id = sv.id AND skv.sale_attr_id = sa.sale_attr_id AND skv.sku_id = ${skuId} WHERE sa.spu_id = ${spuId} ORDER BY sa.sale_attr_id, sv.id
